text: We've got an event calendar built in HubDB, and the client is wanting to automatically redirect old events they've removed from the table to the main events calendar page. But, old event urls look just like current event urls so I can't just write a redirect in the url mapping tool. Any thoughts?
Add another column with a flag as well as a redirected url column? then check for the flag and if the flag is there use the redirect url column instead maybe ?
Thanks <@U4RP6AGV9>, this is probably the best solution for them.
